DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine extent consume cranberry beverage modifies immune function , specifically related γδ T cell innate immune cell . It hypothesize cranberry component interact immune cell activate signal pathway enhance cell function . Enhanced immune cell function result reduce number , duration , severity cold flu symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Cranberry Consumption Improves γδ T Cell Function
DOC.criteria: 21 35 year age good health BMI 18.5 29.9 willing consume study beverage 12 week willing small amount blood drawn two time willing stop consuming tea immuneenhancing dietary supplement ( e.g . antioxidant , probiotic , flavonoidcontaining supplement , fish oil , Echinacea ) 12 week study willing consume 7 serving fruit vegetable day willing limit alcohol consumption 14 glass week willing limit yogurt consumption one 8oz . serve per day food allergy hypertension take nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug chronic basis , antibiotic , immunosuppressive drug sensitive aspirin prone kidney stone current smoker pregnant , lactating , hormone therapy , except birth control pill
